attributes.long-description: Arcade Action Anywhere! Now you can play Midway's classic arcade games anywhere. Anytime. Enjoy the coin-op masterpieces of the past like Mortal Kombat, Gauntlet and Xenophobe with multiplayer wireless support! Tons of portable arcade fun for any gaming fan!
attributes.name: Midway Arcade Treasures Extended Play
